When used to unlock a Schlage Control lock, Mobile ID first performs the transaction and then automatically applies any pending updates to the lock.

Support sending and accepting guest invitations if this feature is enabled by your system administrators. Guests will have access to a subset of the host's locations with the start and end dates and schedule controlled by the host.
Resolves double transaction posting issue for Schlage Control© locks.

- BLE enabled locks which are within BLE range are now sorted in such a manner that locks with a stronger signal strength are at the top.
- Users with lock sharing enabled can now select locations to share. This option must be provisioned by the site administrator.
- Corrected issue with initial barcode.
